title: The first set of English madrigalls to 4. 5. & 6. voyces. Made and newly published by George Kirbye.
author: Kirbye, George, ca. 1565-1634.
publisher: Printed by Thomas Este dwelling in aldersgate street,
notes: Six partbooks. At head of title, part 1: "Cantus. Prim[us]."; part 2: "Cantus. Secund[us]."; part 3: "Altus."; part 4: "Tenor."; part 5: "Bassus."; part 6: "Sextus.".
